product_description: light green pot shaped table lamp with white cone cover

copy_data.primary_copy: Transform any space into a calming oasis with our mint green table lamp. Soft, diffused light creates the perfect ambiance.
copy_data.headline: Serene Style Meets Modern Light
copy_data.description: Elevate your decor with this contemporary table lamp featuring a soothing mint green base and elegant white shade that bathes your space in gentle illumination.

claude_optimized_prompt: A minimalist Scandinavian living room with a mint green ceramic table lamp on a light wood side table, soft warm light glowing through white cone shade, next to a cozy reading nook with neutral textiles, trailing plants in background, shallow depth of field, professional product photography, 8k resolution

image_generation_result.revised_prompt: A minimalist Scandinavian living room featuring a mint green ceramic table lamp with a soft warm light glowing through a white cone shade. The lamp is placed on a light wood side table, beside a cozy reading nook with neutral-toned textiles, creating a calm and inviting atmosphere. Trailing plants can be seen in the background, adding a touch of nature to the scene. The image is captured with a shallow depth of field and styled professionally for product photography, in stunning 8k resolution.
